<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Request Submit default">552424231b5ae9909e6db992cc4bcb60</macroponent><name>form_1/sections</name><preset/><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
  * @param {params} params
  * @param {api} params.api
  * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
  */
function evaluateProperty({
    api
}) {
    if (api.data.glide_form_1.nowRecordFormBlob) {
        var sections = api.data.glide_form_1.nowRecordFormBlob.sections;
        if (sections.length > 0 && api.data.request_detail_internationalization_support_1 && api.data.request_detail_internationalization_support_1.output) {
            sections[0].label = api.data.request_detail_internationalization_support_1['document_approval_form_title'];
            return sections;
        } else {
            return '';
        }
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-04-25 09:02:19</sys_created_on><sys_id>b1a17c2b1b9ae9909e6db992cc4bcb33</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>form_1/sections</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Main Case" source="x_1025229_main_c_0">49ad0cd71bda69909e6db992cc4bcb26</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Main Case">49ad0cd71bda69909e6db992cc4bcb26</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_b1a17c2b1b9ae9909e6db992cc4bcb33</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-04-25 09:02:19</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
